product_name: Imagine Surf Compressor Mission Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This versatile paddleboard's stable design and comfortable standing deck makes it perfect for everyday paddling. And because it's inflatable, it can travel with you anywhere you go.
short_description: This versatile paddleboard's stable design and comfortable standing deck makes it perfect for everyday paddling. And because it's inflatable, it can travel with you anywhere you go.
